para: &app; is a Bible study and research tool based upon the "SWORD Project" libraries and the GNOME Desktop libraries. You can use &app; to do the following:

listitem.para: Make sermon or personal notes on selected passages
Automatically follow Bible footnotes and cross-references
Work in original language study using the available Hebrew and Greek translations

para: &app; aims to provide a simple and clean user interface whilst providing a powerful tool allowing a personalized Bible study environment.

"The SWORD Project" is based at http://www.crosswire.org. Other applications under the same banner are The SWORD Project for Windows (aka BibleCS or WinSword), MacSword for the Macintosh, and BibleTime, another Linux program.

warning.para: &app; is currently in development, so this manual may not reflect the program as you see it. If it does not, please file a bug at the project website, or email gnomesword-developers@lists.sourceforge.net. All help is appreciated, as it will improve the software.
